metadata.title: CVE-2021-43114 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: FORT Validator versions prior to 1.5.2 will crash if an RPKI CA publishesan X.509 EE certificate. This will lead to RTR clients such as BGP routersto lose access to the RPKI VRP data set, effectively disabling Route OriginValidation.

criterions.comment: fort-validator package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
